abstractText: Otoliths (ear bones) can be used for ageing and they can have marks applied (thermally or with stable isotopes (e.g. strontium)) to identify origin. See Reintroduction of Lower Columbia River Chum Salmon into Duncan Creek FFY 2008 to 2010 Summary Report for more (https://pisces.bpa.gov/release/documents/documentviewer.aspx?doc=P123791
title: Otoliths: field collection on adults v1.0
